sections.title: Introduction
sections.content: Welcome to Marketplace. We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information.

subsections.subtitle: Personal Data
subsections.content: Name, email address, phone number, and any other information you provide.

subsections.subtitle: Cookies and Tracking Data
subsections.content: We use cookies to enhance your experience and analyze website usage.

sections.title: How We Use Your Data
content: To provide and maintain our services.
To communicate with you about updates or offers.
To improve user experience and functionality.

sections.title: Legal Basis for Processing Data
content: Consent: By using our services, you agree to our collection and use of data.
Contract: Necessary to fulfill the services you request.
Legal Obligation: Compliance with applicable laws.

sections.title: Data Sharing and Transfers
content: We do not sell your data.
Data may be shared with trusted third-party service providers for business purposes.
Data may be transferred to servers located outside your country, in compliance with GDPR safeguards.

sections.title: Data Retention
sections.content: Your personal data will be retained as long as necessary for the purposes stated or as required by law.

sections.title: Your Rights
content: Access: Request a copy of your data.
Erasure: Request deletion of your data.
Restrict Processing: Limit how your data is used.
Data Portability: Transfer your data to another service.
Withdraw Consent: At any time, without affecting the lawfulness of prior processing.

sections.title: How to Exercise Your Rights
sections.content: Contact us at 466069@student.fontys.nl to exercise your rights. We will respond within 30 days.

sections.title: Data Security
sections.content: We implement technical and organizational measures to protect your data from unauthorized access or disclosure.

sections.title: Updates to This Policy
sections.content: We may update this policy periodically. Changes will be posted on this page with a revised effective date.
